info.additionalInfo:
Change Log:

All future updates: https://userstyles.world/style/1190/nssl

Jan 20 2020:
- Fixed the door manager pop up's background
Jan 19 2020:
- Fix for rejected moves
- Cleaned up a couple colours on yard view & work que
- Highlights border of actively being worked on moves in the work que
- Reports are in a usable state
Aug 25 2020:
- Reduced opacity and added a line though filtered text.
June 22 2020:
- Fixed Announcement Background
June 16 2020:
- Fixed Connectivity Error background
June 12 2020:
- The style is at a fairly completed state.
- Just finished buttons & sliders
